description: This file is a C header file defining API functions related to CCSP SNMP Agent and DBus messaging for network component management, including initialization, parameter retrieval, setting, deletion, and related operations.

methods.name: Cosa_Shutdown
methods.description: Shuts down the SNMP agent platform.

methods.name: Cosa_FindDestComp
methods.description: Finds the destination component supporting a given namespace.

methods.name: Cosa_GetParamValues
methods.description: Retrieves parameter values from a specified component and path.

methods.name: Cosa_SetParamValuesNoCommit
methods.description: Sets parameter values without committing the changes.

methods.name: Cosa_SetCommit
methods.description: Commits or rolls back parameter changes.

methods.name: Cosa_GetInstanceNums
methods.description: Get instance numbers for a specified object.

methods.name: Cosa_AddEntry
methods.description: Adds an entry to a table.

methods.name: Cosa_DelEntry
methods.description: Deletes an entry from a table.

methods.name: Cosa_FreeParamValues
methods.description: Frees memory allocated for parameter values.
